actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain entries of digital processing units.

summary.text: Provides that certain digital processing units for automated data processing machines that are imported into the United States after April 17, 1987, and before January 1, 1988, and are unliquidated as of December 31, 1987, shall be liquidated or reliquidated as duty free upon proper request filed with the appropriate customs officer.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of certain entries of digital processing units.
